description:
Mr. Policeman gets assessed to see if he’s really fit for this job and we get to see what a more realistic Bakabon would look like.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honkan no Tekisei Test na no Da / Real Tensai Bakabon
Mr. Policeman`s Aptitude Test / Real Genius Bakabon
本官の適正テストなのだ / リアル天才バカボン
